languages.text: "Только то, что губернатор плохо справляется со своими обязанностями". {n}Арбитр говорит сухо, словно констатирует факт.{/n} "Бушует бунт планетарного масштаба, и от него разит безумием или того хуже — колдовством. Мятежники ослепляют себя и других и несут самый больной и нечестивый бред, какой я только слышал".

"Only that the governor is failing in his responsibilities." {n}The Proctor's voice is dry, matter-of-fact.{/n} "This is a planet-wide rebellion, and it reeks of madness — or worse: of witchcraft. The rebels are blinding both themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."
languages.original_text: "Только то, что губернатор плохо справляется со своими обязанностями". {n}Арбитр говорит сухо, словно констатирует факт.{/n} "Бушует бунт планетарного масштаба, и от него разит безумием или того хуже — колдовством. Мятежники ослепляют себя и других и несут самый больной и нечестивый бред, какой я только слышал".

traits.locale_text: "Only that the governor is failing in his responsibilities." {n}His voice is dry, matter-of-fact.{/n} "This is a planet-wide rebellion, and it reeks of madness — or worse: of witchcraft. The rebels blind themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

The rebels blind themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

The rebels are blinding both themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

The rebels are blinding both themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

The rebels are blinding both themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

The rebels are blinding both themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

languages.text: "Nur, dass der Gouverneur seine Pflichten vernachlässigt. {n}Die Stimme des Proktors ist trocken und sachlich.{/n} "Wir haben es hier mit einer planetenweiten Rebellion zu tun, die nach Wahnsinn riecht ... oder schlimmer noch: Hexerei! Die Rebellen blenden sich und andere. Ich habe noch nie ein derart wirres und unheiliges Gerede gehört."
languages.original_text: "Only that the governor is failing in his responsibilities." {n}The Proctor's voice is dry, matter-of-fact.{/n} "This is a planet-wide rebellion, and it reeks of madness — or worse: of witchcraft. The rebels are blinding both themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

traits.locale_text: "Nur, dass der Gouverneur seine Pflichten vernachlässigt. {n}Die Stimme des Proktors ist trocken und sachlich.{/n} "Wir haben es hier mit einer planetenweiten Rebellion zu tun, die nach Wahnsinn riecht ... oder schlimmer noch: Hexerei! Die Rebellen blenden sich und andere. Ich habe noch nie ein derart wirres und unheiliges Gerede gehört."

languages.text: « Seulement que le gouverneur manque à ses devoirs, {n}déclare le proctor d'une voix sèche et factuelle.{/n} Toute cette planète est en proie à une rébellion qui empeste la folie, ou pire encore : la sorcellerie. Les insurgés s'aveuglent volontairement et aveuglent les autres. Quant à leurs divagations, ce sont les plus insensées et impies qu'il m'ait jamais été donné d'entendre. »
languages.original_text: "Only that the governor is failing in his responsibilities." {n}The Proctor's voice is dry, matter-of-fact.{/n} "This is a planet-wide rebellion, and it reeks of madness — or worse: of witchcraft. The rebels are blinding both themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

traits.locale_text: « Seulement que le gouverneur manque à ses devoirs, {n}déclare le proctor d'une voix sèche et factuelle.{/n} Toute cette planète est en proie à une rébellion qui empeste la folie, ou pire encore : la sorcellerie. Les insurgés s'aveuglent volontairement et aveuglent les autres. Quant à leurs divagations, ce sont les plus insensées et impies qu'il m'ait jamais été donné d'entendre. »

languages.text: «Solo que el gobernador está incumpliendo sus responsabilidades». {n}El Procurador habla con un pragmatismo casi indiferente.{/n} «Se ha producido una rebelión a escala planetaria que hiede a locura... o aún peor, a brujería. Los insurgentes se ciegan a sí mismos y también a otros, y sus desvaríos son los más delirantes y blasfemos que he oído jamás».
languages.original_text: "Only that the governor is failing in his responsibilities." {n}The Proctor's voice is dry, matter-of-fact.{/n} "This is a planet-wide rebellion, and it reeks of madness — or worse: of witchcraft. The rebels are blinding both themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

traits.locale_text: «Solo que el gobernador está incumpliendo sus responsabilidades». {n}El Procurador habla con un pragmatismo casi indiferente.{/n} «Se ha producido una rebelión a escala planetaria que hiede a locura... o aún peor, a brujería. Los insurgentes se ciegan a sí mismos y también a otros, y sus desvaríos son los más delirantes y blasfemos que he oído jamás».

languages.text: “我唯一了解到的事情，就是总督没有尽到他的责任。”{n}监察官以实事求是的语气，冷冰冰地开了口。{/n}“这场叛乱席卷了整颗行星，到处散发着疯狂的气息——甚至更糟糕，是巫术的气息。那些叛乱分子打算弄瞎所有人的眼睛，我从来没听过如此癫狂、如此邪恶的疯言疯语。”
languages.original_text: "Only that the governor is failing in his responsibilities." {n}The Proctor's voice is dry, matter-of-fact.{/n} "This is a planet-wide rebellion, and it reeks of madness — or worse: of witchcraft. The rebels are blinding both themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

traits.locale_text: “我唯一了解到的事情，就是总督没有尽到他的责任。”{n}监察官以实事求是的语气，冷冰冰地开了口。{/n}“这场叛乱席卷了整颗行星，到处散发着疯狂的气息——甚至更糟糕，是巫术的气息。那些叛乱分子打算弄瞎所有人的眼睛，我从来没听过如此癫狂、如此邪恶的疯岩疯语。”

languages.text: 「ただ一つ言えるのは、総督がその責務を果たしていないということです」{n}代理人の声は淡々として、事務的だった。{/n}「これは惑星規模の反乱です。狂気の匂いがする……いや、それ以上に、魔術の気配すらあります。反乱軍どもは自分たちの目だけでなく、他人の目まで盲目にしています。奴らのうわ言は、これまでに聞いた中でも最も狂気じみていて冒涜的です」
languages.original_text: "Only that the governor is failing in his responsibilities." {n}The Proctor's voice is dry, matter-of-fact.{/n} "This is a planet-wide rebellion, and it reeks of madness — or worse: of witchcraft. The rebels are blinding both themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

traits.locale_text: 「ただ一つ言えるのは、総督がその責務を果たしていないということです」{n}代理人の声は淡々として、事務的だった。{/n}「これは惑星規模の反乱です。狂気の匂いがする……いや、それ以上に、魔術の気配すらあります。反乱軍どもは自分たちの目だけでなく、他人の目まで盲目にしています。奴らのうわ言は、これまでに聞いた中でも最も狂気じみていて冒涜的です」

languages.text: "Valinin sorumluluklarını yerine getirmediğini biliyorum, o kadar" {n}Üsteğmen, sade ve hissiz bir tavırla konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu, gezegen çapında bir isyan. Bir deliliğin veya daha kötüsü bir cadılığın mahsulü. İsyancılar hem kendilerinin hem de başkalarının zihinlerini zehirliyor. Bunların zırvalıkları kadar saçma ve uğursuz bir şey duymadım."
languages.original_text: "Only that the governor is failing in his responsibilities." {n}The Proctor's voice is dry, matter-of-fact.{/n} "This is a planet-wide rebellion, and it reeks of madness — or worse: of witchcraft. The rebels are blinding both themselves and others, and their ravings are the most insane and unholy thing I've ever heard."

Bir deliliğin veya daha kötüsü bir cadılığın mahsulü. İsyancılar hem kendilerinin hem de başkalarının zihinlerini zehirliyor. Bunların zırvalıkları kadar saçma ve uğursuz bir şey duymadım."
